secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with a traditional beach day can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Beach towel" and "sunscreen".
Can I bring a swimsuit?
Yes, you can bring a swimsuit.
Player: Can I bring a surfboard?
Yes, you can bring a surfboard.
Player: Can I bring a picnic basket?
No, you cannot bring a picnic basket.
Player: Can I bring sunglasses?
Yes, you can bring sunglasses.
Player: Can I bring a beach umbrella?
Yes, you can bring a beach umbrella.
Player: Can I bring a beach ball?
Yes, you can bring a beach ball.
Player: Can I bring a pair of flip-flops?
Yes, you can bring a pair of flip-flops.
Player: Can I bring a cooler?
Yes, you can bring a cooler.
Player: Can I bring a kite?
Yes, you can bring a kite.
The rule seems to be that you can bring items typically associated with a beach day, but not items related to food or eating.
Incorrect. Please try again.
